about-text.label: Delivery From USA to Armenia was always a hard problem. The delivery fee is either unreasonably high and it takes ages. So here comes AraratExpress and make all things in 3 simple steps. We are the company that makes it possible to get all the advantages of delivering goods and get them in Armenia safely and at lower prices
